item.title: 自我介绍
item.description: ****** **大学 软件工程硕士 多年从事过.Net、Java和vue、C、Python等前后端的开发，Nginx、Docker运维。以及软件开发管理。目前AI算法的库或框架学习和应用，如TensorFlow、PyTorch等。

item.title: Self Introduction
item.description: I am Master of Software Engineering from ******University. After graduation, I served as a computer teacher in a vocational secondary school for one year. Later, I worked in different software companies in development and management roles. I have worked on the National Land Governance Platform in *** Technology, the Water Conservancy Governance Platform in ** Information Technology, and the Securities Business Platform in ** Technology. The longest time I worked was in a foreign trade company ********** where I was responsible for IT for over ten years.
